resources.string: Sorry, We don\u0027t have this prover.
Sorry, Something went wrong. Please check out Contact Us menu
You have set 00 Hours 00 minutes 00 seconds as interval
The maximum interval time allowed is 24 hours. To improve the battery power backup, the longer interval is recommended.
Setting up the application for the first time. This will take few minutes. Please don\'t close this application. Thank you for your Patience!!!
For complaints, suggestions or feedback please email us at:
Your complaints and suggestions will be addressed within hours. Cheers!!!
This is a free dictionary application to help you to learn english words and its meanings in a better and easy way.

◆ Once you installed this application, go to add widget settings and find the 'TamilProverbs' widget from the widgets list and add it to the homescreen.
◆ For the first time it will ask you to set the interval. Interval is the time frequency that how often the words will be changed on the screen.
◆ If you want to change the interval you have to add a new widget. The interval time set is one time configuration for each widget.
◆ The interval time can be configured as seconds,minutes and hours.
◆ Once you configured the interval time in the configuration screen then clicking 'Ok' will add the widget to your homescreen wherever you wish. Clicking 'Cancel' will not add the widget.

◆ Launch 'TamilProverbs' application from the applications menu.
◆ In TAMIL PROVERBS application, you can scroll down and scroll up to see all the words.
◆ You can dynamically search as you type by clicking the search icon in the action bar.
◆ You can quickly jump to each alphabetical sections by clicking/dragging through the side selector.

✓ Ad-Free ⇒ No disturbing advertisements.
✓ Multi Language support - Including English, Tamil, Hindi, Kannada, Telugu.
✓ Many more options - settings to change the theme, select the number of words, etc.
✓ Instant support for any issues/suggestions.
✓ Redirect to any words clicked on the list of words and its meanings.
✓ Ability to add your own words and its Meanings.
✓ Navigate to previous or next word from the widget itself.

Thanks for using TAMIL PROVERBS.

If you enjoy using TAMIL PROVERBS, Please take a moment to rate it. It will take only a minute.

Thanks for your support!
